ruleEntry.formula:
RecordType.DeveloperName="FI_Internal_Case"
&&
TEXT(Type) = 'Owner/Legal Form Change' &&
( ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type) )

AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName="SE_Internal_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName="SE_Retention" ), OR( TEXT(Type)= "Sales Task", TEXT(Type)="Retention", TEXT(Type) = 'Owner/Legal Form Change', ISBLANK(TEXT(Type)) ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId), ISCHANGED(Type) ) )

(RecordType.DeveloperName="CD_Entry_Case" && TEXT(Type)="Restaurant - Data") || (RecordType.DeveloperName="CD_Internal_Case" && (TEXT(Type)="Termination" || TEXT(Type)="Restaurant - Transmission" || TEXT(Type)="Take Offline" || TEXT(Type)="Take Online")) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))

(RecordType.DeveloperName="CD_Internal_Case" && TEXT(Type)="Sales Task") || (RecordType.DeveloperName="CD_Restaurant_Operations" && TEXT(Type)="Restaurant Operations") || RecordType.DeveloperName="CD_Retention" && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))

criteriaItems.value: Yogiyo Inbound,Yogiyo Refund,Yogiyo Entry Case,Yogiyo Internal Case

ruleEntry.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName="Talabat_Internal_Case" && ((TEXT( Case_Reason__c )="Clone Request") || ISPICKVAL(Type,'Owner/Legal Form Change')) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Case_Reason__c ))
(RecordType.DeveloperName="Talabat_Internal_Case" && TEXT(Type)="Sales Task") && NOT(TEXT( Case_Reason__c )="Premium Placement") && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))

( RecordType.DeveloperName="Talabat_Internal_Case" && ( ( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Account Management') || ISPICKVAL(Type,'Retention') ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Sales Task') && ISPICKVAL(Case_Reason__c,'Premium Placement') ) ) ) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))

(((RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Restaurant_Operations" && TEXT(Type)="Onboarding") || (RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Entry_Case" && TEXT(Type)="Menu Processing") || (RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Internal_Case" && (TEXT(Type)="Owner/Legal Form Change" || TEXT(Type)="Take Offline" || TEXT(Type)="Take Online" || TEXT(Type)="Retention"))) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type)) && Account.Key_VIP_Account__c=true) || EmailToAddress__c = 'vip@lieferheld.de'

RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Internal_Case" && TEXT(Type)="CC Task" && TEXT( Case_Reason__c )<>"Rating On website / Reviews" && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type)) && TEXT(Origin)<>"Chat"

RecordType.DeveloperName = "DE_Internal_Case" && (TEXT(Type)="Sales Task" || TEXT(Type)="Account Management") && (TEXT(Case_Reason__c)= "Contract Update" || TEXT(Case_Reason__c)= "Delivery Areas" || TEXT(Case_Reason__c)= "Delivery Fees / Minimum Order Value" || TEXT(Case_Reason__c)= "Meal Deals" || TEXT(Case_Reason__c)= "New Hardware" || TEXT(Case_Reason__c)="Premium Placement" || TEXT(Case_Reason__c)="Quality Concerns" || TEXT(Case_Reason__c)= "Printer Request") && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(Type) || ISCHANGED(Case_Reason__c))
RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Internal_Case" && TEXT(Type)="CC Task" && TEXT( Case_Reason__c )="Rating On website / Reviews" && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))
RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Internal_Case" && (TEXT(Type)="Retention" || TEXT(Type)="Sales Task" || TEXT(Type)="Owner/Legal Form Change") && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))
RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Entry_Case" && TEXT(Type)="Menu Change" && TEXT(Case_Reason__c )="Menu Change" && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type) || ISCHANGED(Case_Reason__c))
RecordType.DeveloperName="DE_Entry_Case" && TEXT(Type)="Menu Change" && TEXT(Case_Reason__c )="Logo" && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type) || ISCHANGED(Case_Reason__c))

RecordType.DeveloperName ="PY_Entry_Case" && ( TEXT(Type) = "Menu Processing" || TEXT(Type) = "Restaurant - Data" || TEXT(Type) = "Photo Listing" ) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))

RecordType.DeveloperName ="PY_Inbound_Case" && ( Text(Type) = "Customer" || ISBLANK(TEXT(Type)) ) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId)) && ( Text(Origin) <> "Facebook" || Text(Origin) <> "Twitter" || Text(Origin) <> "Instagram" )
RecordType.DeveloperName ="PY_Internal_Case" && ( TEXT(Type) = "Sales Task" && (TEXT( Case_Reason__c )="Clone Request")) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))

RecordType.DeveloperName ="PY_Internal_Case" && ( TEXT(Type) = "Sales Task" || TEXT(Type) = "Account Management" || TEXT(Type) = "Retention" ) && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Type))
AND( OR( ISNEW (), ISCHANGED(Type) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Handover'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Other'), ISPICKVAL(Type, '') ), RecordType.DeveloperName="AT_Inbound_Case" )
